title: Dokotoo Womens 2025 Formal Dresses Wrap V-Neck Ruched Sexy Bridesmaid Wedding Guest Maxi Dresses
description: *ZIPPER on the back is hidden style so may be difficult to pull up or down. Please be patient and careful. It will help if you hold the the side clothes steady while pulling the zipper.
Size: S=US 4-6,M=US 8-10,L=US 12-14,XL=US 16-18. Check more info of this Formal Dress in Size Chart and Product Description. Please choose carefully according to your size.
Long dress features v-neck, sleeveless and side split design, which is sexy and flattering. Ruched detail of the high waisted dress is elegant and chic, showing off your body shape and fashion taste.
Soft and lightweight material makes the maxi dress comfy to wear. You can enjoy the comfort and softness with nice fit and well-made.

This evening dress pairs well with necklace, handbag, heels and etc to catch everyone's eyes. It is suitable to wear the party dress for formal or semi-formal occasions like party, wedding guest, bridesmaid and club.
